Team Tees

Welcome to the team.

What we do.

Our goal at Team Tees is to supply clothing to as many people in poverty as possible. And we would like you to help us.

How can you help?

We have made a deal with 100's of clothing designers to allow us to ask for a small amount of money. Five dollars. For only five dollars we can send 3 new outfits to one person. This means with a ten dollar bill you can put new clothes on two peoples backs.

How many have we helped so far?

Since we just started we have only helped a handful of people. Roughly 30,000.
